'''''Rocky Avildsen''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Rocky Avildsen|text=Rocky Avildsen &mdash; "A Gentleman Personality"}}.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Rocky can be found on the path northeast of [[Weeping Willow of the Lake]], [[Erinnyes Forest]].
*: <gallery>
Achievement Rocky Avildsen Location.png|Map Location
Achievement Rocky Avildsen Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* Rocky Avildsen is a reference to {{w|Rocky Balboa}}, the protagonist of the ''{{w|Rocky (franchise)|Rocky}}'' film series.
** His name is an amalgam of both Rocky's name and that of {{w|John G. Avildsen}}, the director of the first Rocky film.
